constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 103 (Thursday, June 16, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. LaMALFA:
H.R. 8116.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Clause 1 of Section 8 of Article I of the U.S.
Constitution: ``The Congress shall have power to lay and
collect taxes, duties, imposts and excises, to pay the debts
and provide for the common defense and general welfare of the
United States; but all duties, imposts and excises shall be
uniform throughout the United States.''
[Page H5646]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

title: Modern, Clean, and Safe Trucks Act of 2022
